name: RoboForm Safenote File
summary: Learn about .RFN files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

content: Unlike .RFP password files, RFN files are not used to automatically fill online forms. They are only used as a way to store sensitive text-based data.

description: Safenote file created by RoboForm, a program used for securely storing personal information; contains a secret text fragment, such as an ATM password or a lock key combination; used to safely save and review sensitive personal information.
